segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she looks so calm and focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn’t seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids sneaking cookies, and it’s actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and I’m surprised it hasn’t tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is waiting for her turn, and it’s cute how patient she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and I’m amazed the woman hasn’t slipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but everyone seems fine for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I’m too surprised to react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
